pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hypothesis Tests for Association Between Subgroups in Two Data Views // Tests for association between subgroups in two multivariate data views, two network data views, or a multivariate data view and a network data view. (Reference 1 is Gao, L.L., Bien, J., and Witten, D. (2019) Are Clusterings of Multiple Data Views Independent? to appear in Biostatistics, Reference 2 is Gao, L.L., Witten, D., Bien, J. Testing for Association in Multi-View Network Data, preprint.)
